content: in #29251, in the file StandardSubspace.lean, I have 2 imports, and if I delete any one of them, I get errors. but #min_imports tells me to include only Mathlib.Analysis.CStarAlgebra.Module.Constructions. what's wrong with it?
didn't look at the PR, but is it because #min_imports doesn't know about the different imports the module system brings? (public vs. non-public)
no, all imports are public import and all the code is under @[expose] public section.
